attributes.action: Erect a monument & roll of honour to ALL keyworkers who past away due to COVID19
attributes.additional_details: The same as with other times of national trauma it is only right that we as a nation recognise those who gave us the greatest sacrifice are honoured by those who can. We must also not forget their sacrifice so that we can return to leading our lives in full, and that generations to come don't forget how fragile our health really is and that we can't allow complicacy to allow this to happen again. We should honour ALL who in the course of continuing to work gave the greatest gift for the nation.
attributes.background: Once the pandemic has passed we call on the UK Government to erect a monument, included within a roll of honour of all NHS staff, Care workers and ALL other keyworkers who lost their life's to Coronavirus who at the countries hours of need kept us safe, cared for us and kept the country supplied.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

Create a National Covid-19 Key worker memorial Commemorate the fallen: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315516  

You may also wish to sign some of these petitions:

Award posthumous medals to NHS and other frontline workers; victims of covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312389 

A medal to honour the fortitude of people working in essential occupations: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308035 

Commission a Memorial Plaque to honour and remember UK victims of the Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310097
